content:
That's a great approach! Adding the vegan parmesan towards the end of cooking will allow the flavors to meld together beautifully, and you'll still get a nice, subtle cheesy flavor without overpowering the other ingredients.

I'm thrilled to hear that you're excited to try out this recipe! Mushroom Bolognese is a classic dish that's perfect for a cozy night in, and the addition of vegan parmesan will give it a unique twist.

Remember to taste and adjust as you go, and don't hesitate to reach out if you have any more questions or need further guidance. And most importantly, enjoy the process and have fun experimenting with new flavors!

If you'd like, feel free to share how your dish turns out, and I'd be happy to hear about your experience. Happy cooking!
